text: The National-Democratic Association "Ukraine" () is a political party in Ukraine registered on September 1, 2000. Партія „Національно-демократичне об'єднання „Україна“, DATA The party did not participate in the Ukrainian 2002 parliamentary elections. In the 2006 elections, the party failed as part of the electoral alliance Yuriy Karmazin Bloc to win parliamentary representation. In the 2007 elections, the party failed again as part of the All-Ukrainian Community to win parliamentary representation. In the 2010 local elections National-Democratic Association "Ukraine" won a few seat in city councils in Western Ukraine. Drohobych city council, Central Election Commission of Ukraine Huto-Borovenska city council, Central Election Commission of Ukraine The party did not participate in the 2012 parliamentary elections. Results of voting in single constituencies in 2012 & Nationwide list, Central Election Commission of Ukraine And again did not participate in the 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election.Alphabetical Index of parties in 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election, Central Election Commission of Ukraine == References == ==External links== * Official website Category:Political parties in Ukraine
title: National-Democratic Association "Ukraine"
